website_summaries.verdict: Handsomely designed with modern looks and functionality. More suited for travelers and those on the go.
pros: Fits comfortably and folds up nicely for those with minimal storage space
Great for professionals who need clarity of sound while roaming about a workspace
Not as bulky as other products when wearing
cons: Not as highly rated as its larger, non-folding older brother model, the N700NC M2

customer_reviews.title: noise cancellation is not great
customer_reviews.text: its a shame the reviews were so great and the noise cancelling feature (which is the reason I purchased them) is just not what its cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice overal as introduced by so many users until I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice overal as introduced by so many users until I made decision to purchase it. One little thing that I didn't expect to have is... When Im in the silent area such as my house when kids are in the school, I can hear mild white noise through the headphone when I don't play music with power on & bluetooth connected. But I have to say it's pretty mild sound so I can disregard it. Furthermore how many times would I wear headphone without playing music? So I like this gadget, I am using it everyday and I will use it for a long time because I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dongjin, L.

customer_reviews.title: Good phones!
customer_reviews.text: They're great. Sound good, Bluetooth connects flawlessly. I like the low profile design. Sound cancelation not as good as my old Boss QC15s, but good enough. Wish there was an auto power off feature. Also, as a bald guy, I wish the top band had more padding. On long flights I get a sore indent on the top of my melon.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Foss

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great and they are easy to pair
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great and they are easy to pair; however, the skip/previous track and pause/play trigger/button is flimsy. Mine still works, but you have to hit it in the right spot. Luckily I can still use the controls on the phone. For the price these are now, I would still buy it. Just keep this in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome headset. I already got a Bose Quite Comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome headset. I already got a Bose Quite Comfort 35 II ... that was comfortable for sure. But this guy has lot better sound quality than Bose. Try it you will forget Bose. Product has superb noise cancellation too. Only issue is it is on ear so ear gets hot on long time play. AKG should make one over ear product with same quality with Siri connectivity for iOS devices.
customer_reviews.author: Somu

customer_reviews.title: Good noise cancelling headset, not perfect...
customer_reviews.text: This a very good noise cancelling headset, with decent audio quality over Bluetooth (amazing when using audio jack) and great battery life. One complain I have (the reason I gave it 4 stars) is the comfort when using over an extended period of time; I can not exactly pinpoint what is wrong - the position is good, the weight is barely noticeable, they don't get hot, but... every chance I have to take them off between long conference calls, it feels so good not to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: J Markh

customer_reviews.title: Best portable choice
customer_reviews.text: I have other Sony and Bose branded earphone. They are heavy and may be okay to carry to other places. However, I think it is too heavy after a day long use. I decided to survey all the earphones and figure out that one of my favorite brand - AKG has this good earphone. I bought it. The sound quality is gooood especially on human voice. The noise cancellation is comparingly bad but still really nice! I would from now on carry this for all my flights or noise places. I love it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Walt C.

customer_reviews.title: The blazing blue power light makes them unusable in dark settins.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice headphones, but be warned, if you wear them in a dark room, the ridiculous blue power led will light the whole room and disturb everyone. You can not wear them on an overnight flight, you will get punched, you cannot wear them to watch a movie in bed, your mate will punch you in the throat.
customer_reviews.author: Ted O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The package came fast, the boxing was solid, and the headphones are beautiful. The sound quality is amazing, the noise canceling was as simple as turning on the headphone. I work in an office with a white noise machine nearby, flip these headphone on and BAM...it instantly goes away. Clear sound, deep base, the headphones feel slightly heavy, but the quality is great. BUY this product, I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: I ordered around Black Friday 2018 but received the WIRED version, not Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware; I ordered these around Black Friday 2018, but I received the non-Bluetooth version. The vendor was Unicore. I have contacted Unicore and hopefully this is just an error. I will amend this review when I know more. I have used the Bluetooth version before and I give it very high marks. I look forward to writing a proper, glowing review once this order is straightened out.
customer_reviews.author: Mstar

customer_reviews.title: A fine purchase for their $140 price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for long wearing. Better than expected noise canceling for an on ear device. Effective on planes and trains or with any similar regular background noise. Like their sound. Crisp, detailed, not to boomy nor too tinny. Decent battery life. Easy BT connections. I don’t bother with the cable but it’s always an option. The fold flat way the ear cups rotate works well for stowing in a backpack. They look good, too. I didn’t pay $25 extra for a color besides black. All around, a fine purchase for their $140 price.
customer_reviews.author: Mobidoc

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound, weight and size of these headsets. Paid $120 and I thought it was a fair price. Takes a while to get use to the buttons but all in all a good set for traveling. Was able to pair my desktop and my notebook with little problems. Also paired with Samsung 7 cell phone. Have used both wireless and wired with no problems. Have played my own personal library of music and Pandora with no problems. Glad it includes Airline adapter and charger cable as well as USB cable for PC connection.
customer_reviews.author: Seal8

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these at first, but the quality quickly deteriorated. I thought my school had bad wifi because the sounds I listen to were always glitching, but I tried some airpods and did not have the same issue, so there is definitely an issue with the bluetooth. Also, I think the noise cancellation capability decreased over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Blagg

customer_reviews.title: Hissing and loud popping after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for work because they were highly recommended. After about a week, starting to make a loud pop any time audio kicked on, even when just skipping from one song to the next. Developed a hiss at the same time and this is unfortunately more than just the regular noise cancelling one (hiss increased as the volume did and created an echo effect, so seemed like a speaker issue). Replacing to see if it's just a bad unit and will update if the new one doesn't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: C.G WH.

customer_reviews.title: Save you money on Bose and buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was surprised. They are not as good at noise cancelling (I fly on planes a lot) as the Bose Quiet Confort, but their music, movie and gaming sound is way better. Not to mention, their price is way better. The fold up and fit in the included bag, work perfect and seems like forever on a single change via Bluetooth and also come with a cable for direct hookup to audio jacks and airplane inputs! Very nicely done! Did I mention how compact they are. Fit right in my briefcase!
customer_reviews.author: TURBODRIVER24

customer_reviews.title: NOT Bluetooth as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and went to pair with my Bluetooth to find there are no settings or controls to do that. Checked online and the headphones should have two controls on the right side for this. These have nothing. Completely not what I was led to believe I was getting. Not sure who the seller is as it falls under the Amazon fulfillment blanket. VERY disappointing. Oh, they don't fit as well as Bose or Sony either.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry8206

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: For the price point I expected the sound quality to be a little more mind blowing. However, overall these are good headphones and the battery life is really good. They also charge super fast, which is handy. They cancel noise well enough to keep me focused in a busy and loud office environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hanke

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Well first into the ergonomics. This thing was easy to carry and had a quality feel. However the sound failed to excite me. Bass was soft for me. In this proce range, I dont know if there is anything better, but if you can spent few more, go for Sony 1000mX3 or AKGs next higher models.
customer_reviews.author: Renz

customer_reviews.title: Eat your heart out Bose
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are outstanding. I’ve been looking for an over the ear set that doesn’t overheat my ears, and that isn’t ridiculously priced. Sound quality and noise cancellation are outstanding. Used on iPhone XS only so far, and will test with Android later this week. Battery life is great as well. I travel a lot for work, and will put these through the ringer this coming week. Only recommendation to AKG is a more rigid protective case. Will buy and aftermarket one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The N60NC was purchased on Jan. 28 2020 and failed on April 6 2020. Samsung does not support third party sellers and so I had to return to this seller. This seller has yet to resolve the issue. The issue is that they do not connect via bluetooth to my iPad Pro and the sound breaks up. I will amend this review pending the seller resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Farseer1952

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I like most everything about these sky's. Great size terrific sound everything is for the money. Just a couple of things one is I personally would like more security or clamp force against my ears and when you take them off and place around your neck they don't fold down you have to take them off and turn them around a small thing but it bugs me. I have a great set up with focal clear a naim dac and stream qobuz through blue sound that's beautiful. So I think sound quality is worth keeping the akg.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great casual headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student and I have these with me at all times. Portability is wonderful. So far, I've had no problems with battery life and my phone (iPhone 6) tells me how much battery is left on my headphones. The noise cancelling works really well, but it doesn't totally block absolutely everything out (and I'm okay with that). Listening to music at a quiet volume is really important because I listen to music all day long and I don't want to blow my hearing. The on-ear is good for average sized ears but might be troublesome for larger ears. Haven't had any problems with bluetooth connecting to other people's devices or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: kristella

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bangs for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This on-the-ear headset is a great value, with sleek looks, ergonomic design and easy to carry as it can be folded into half. Its provides approx. 65% noise cancellation (e.g., in an airplane) as opposed to top-of the line headphones from Sony and Bose that cost nearly twice as much, plus they're much bulkier as they are over-the-ear design. The battery life and sound quality is actually very good...unless you want over 80% noise cancellation, you can't go wrong with this AKG model.
customer_reviews.author: Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Retract previous review (05/14/2020)
customer_reviews.text: The cables I had complained about missing were found within the carrying pouch. The headphones charged up quickly and they were easily paired with my Samsung Galaxy Note 9 phone. The sound quality is wonderful and the noise canceling is as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, but lacking durability
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and noise cancellation are excellent on both Bluetooth and wired. The big issue with these headphones is that the ball and socket joint holding the cans to the headbands is not durable. When it breaks, the headband loses tension, leading to the headphones falling off when worn. My pair that I bought and the warranty replacement pair both broke in this way within a year of use. A secondary issue is that the play/pause (start call/end call) button also fails, but that doesn't prevent use of the device.
customer_reviews.author: T Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just ok sound. Not comfortable after long use.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life was decent but the sound was just ok. I didn’t feel that the size of the cups were big enough to fully take advantage of the noise cancellation. The big reason for my 3 stars was comfort. They are solidly built but the weight with the thin cushioning on the headband made them uncomfortable for me. I don’t feel like I could wear these for hours like on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Squash Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Bought these for my brother as a gift. He almost never takes them off. Even goes to sleep with them. The sound quality for something that is wireless is awesome. They have a professional look to them which is nice. You can wear them in the office or in the gym. The noise cancelling works really good as well. Mowing the lawn is much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Colby B.

customer_reviews.title: They are not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get it to give it a 4.5, the bass is just a little lacking but not enough to warrant 4 stars Edit: So I've had these headphones for around a year, but they've already broken. The sound is crackly and they dont hold a charge. Wish I'd just saved up and bought better headphones
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, no actual noise cancellation great battery life
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and have really good sound and the built in mic (from what I've been told by who I talked to on the other end of the phone call) is really good. My only complaint is that there isn't really any noticeable noise cancellation beyond what is provided by having the headphones covering your ears, but for the price these headphones can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noise canceling headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the traveler. I travel by air every other week and these headphones have worked great! Even without music playing these headphones cancel out almost all of the rumble and chatter of an airplane. I am not an audio expert, but for me my iPhone music has never sounded so good! Previously I had to turn up my earbuds almost to full volume just to hear the music over all of the engine noise, now I can set the volume at the lowest setting and hear great. Lastly, the price and compact size of these headphones make them a great value! I won’t travel without them!
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Here comes the boom!
customer_reviews.text: I will update as I use more, but so far, so good. The sounds is great. They noise cancelling, although not as good as my Bose wired headset, is good enough. They connect to my computer the minute they are turned on. I'd recommend, as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: The Cartoonist

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my early generation noise canceling headphones these are great. I don't like that I have to charge it rather than replace batteries (I tend to only use them while flying) however it is easy enough to charge them with a small battery pack that I sue for the phone. Good value and good performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: My gf loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my gf, she works in a fairly noisy environment and has extremely sensitive hearing. Neither one of us are experts at audio gear, but the sound is great and the noise cancelling works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: danno

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure that this would be a good purchase at this price point but I am absolutely delighted with the build and sound quality. I use these in blue tooth mode on a 2020 IPAD pro and the sound quality is pretty close to my significantly more expensive wired headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great
customer_reviews.text: I use these for working out on a stationary bike, and as they're not over the ears but on the ears they don't contribute to overheating. Sound quality is great, and noise cancelling is good enough. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: hd

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband who loves to listen to music while he's working on projects such as woodworking. These headphones have some heft to them because they are made of high-quality materials. His only complaint is that the bluetooth wears down the battery too quickly so he often just plugs them in.
customer_reviews.author: oedgotfacts

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these to me for travel and I just love them. They are well made and super comfortable. I think they are fantastic and worth every penny. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: inlovewithart

customer_reviews.title: Popping sounds, one side stops working
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to noise canceling. They work some what but I can still hear the neighbors above me when their feet hit the floor. Every now and then there is a real loud pop sound which does not seem to effect the sound but it shocking when it happens. The sound has ompletely gone out on one side then eventuly comes back. I don't find them cocmfortable on my ears, will pick a oplong opening next time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in its price range!
customer_reviews.text: What makes these headphones a perfect choice: 1) low weight 2) accessories (very good quality control cable for direct mode, quite smallsize holder) 3) nice balanced sound in both BT and direct mode 4) good noise cancelling (but not as good as i thougt) with enjoyable lower volume listening 5) good battery life (would be better with NC OFF option...) and limitless listening option with cable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I can strongly recommend these AKG cans. They sound wonderful, pair to bluetooth quickly and work really well.
customer_reviews.author: nyrlo

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The first pair was missing parts, the second is not a year old and the earpiece broke from the mount. Poor design. Weak construction.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Faszl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the money. Used them on 4 flights already. Again.. Great for the money
customer_reviews.author: richardom5

customer_reviews.title: Finally - two sets of headphones at once!
customer_reviews.text: This Boltune Bluetooth transmitter/receiver functions free of static and retains audio clarity over a wide dynamic range. I love being able to listen with a friend over two sets of headphones, and appreciate the unit's reasonable price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Neville Berle

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly disappointed. It barely soften the sound of a computer fan. The headset wasn't adjustable to a comfortable size for the didnt squeeze my head. And the speakers got very warm after 5 min of wearing. Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: N. Eckert

customer_reviews.title: The headphones I received are not the same as the ones on the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the headphones on the picture and I received a different one, not the same, I feel I was scammed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective with one side lower volume than other
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my wife, based on all the reviews at Amazon and other professional Audio sites. Compared to my Bose QC35, I would choose any time QC35, but if you are not willing to spend ~$350, AKG are quite good on their own, if they would work properly.
customer_reviews.author: YLis

customer_reviews.title: Fine headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones allow me to listen to music when in a noisy room. They are comfortable and produce a great sound with long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my husband who is now addicted to them. Also travels with them and claims that flights are less tiring without the constant hum of the engines.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, disappointed in noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound but I do not get noise cancellation unless I turn the sound up really loud, then I its too loud. Really disappointed in that as this was my main reason for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: KTH

customer_reviews.title: rock and blues masters
customer_reviews.text: i like music that isn’t terribly bass biased, and these sound great for rock, blues, and jazz. the noise canceling is a thing i’d like to be able to turn off (possible when wired, not with bluetooth) because it degrades sound quality a little. they did take a full 30 hour break in period to lose some tinniness in very high frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Kent VandenBerg

customer_reviews.title: Connects beautifully, syncs sound flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Connects beautifully, syncs sound flawlessly, sounds good, folds and travels really well. Two big issues: 1) the power switch is right next to and is the exact same shape and feel as the "next/previous" switch; this is frequent disaster. 2) does hurt the ears after wearing for long periods, because of the squish/clamp nature of them. Feels fine enough at first, however that pressure is certainly felt later.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my head
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit my head even at the shortest setting. Way too big. It just slipped right off. It didn't cancel noise completely, but the music was crystal clear and that's all I needed when it comes to sound quality. Unfortunately, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Noise Cancelling Headphones, Comfy While Wearing Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones. Many others pushed too hard on my glasses but these do not. Noise cancelling is ok and sound quality is good. Haven't found anything comparable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonJS

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge after year of use - edited
customer_reviews.text: Bought them 2019 and will not charge by 2020. The sounded good when they worked. Seems like a bad investment for 10 months of use. **contacted AKG and they were willing to replace the headphones
customer_reviews.author: danielandres

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, slim profile, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Lightweight, good crisp clean sound. Good balance of bass without it being too heavy. More lightweight than most over ear headphones. Slim profile not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound and works on an airplane. I can't even hear the roar of the engines. These are the best headphones I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: hooked

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I'm very happy with with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: They are just okay. Not as good as the nonwireless version.
customer_reviews.author: Fortheloveofjack

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more for better noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, but the noise cancellation feature is not the best. It connects to Bluetooth quickly on my Android device. The sound quality is about what you would expect from a pair of headphones at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Numerous issues with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: There are numerous issues with bluetooth connections. Worst thing is that when turning off the headphones, there is a very annoying loud sound that is emitted.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Y.

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: After buying these headphones, I wondered whether they were new or refurbished because of the packaging. The seller ignored me. I can only assume the seller knows something it does not want to tell me, or that it doesn't care about me as a customer since it made the sale. Nevertheless, the headphones seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for travel
customer_reviews.text: Amazing item, best for travel - compact, easy, soft ear pads - used to have a headache after few hours flying with other headphones. Sound, noises cancelling and batteries just what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphone for my hun hun he seems to like them alot so I'm happy about that they was package nicely and came in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I like.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Doesn’t cancel as much as hoped on airplane.
customer_reviews.author: gary michell

customer_reviews.title: Serial numbers
customer_reviews.text: There were coverings over serial numbers on both products, now we are unable to register or warranty these products.....why were they covered? Marked as new. 2017.....are they new?
customer_reviews.author: prissy mceachern

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones, good sound quality - but won't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mid-range pair of headphones. The music quality is fantastic, the build quality is pretty good, and I find them quite comfortable to keep on for long-ish periods of time. The noise cancellation is decent without being extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Disktop

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancelling and sound quality. Overall a very nice headphone to have.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Pathak

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphone with not so good battery life
customer_reviews.text: nice sound quality, noise cancellation. It's really a pity to have such a nice product with this short battery life. However, with this price, you really can't say no to it. If you are finding some good quality headphones with limited budget, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently for work and these are with me for every trip. Great sound quality and noise cancelling, especially on noisy flights. They fold down into a compact size and have good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Beaton

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Used them flying for 25 hours and lasted the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: DMP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great, love these headphones. Excellent sound quality and cancellation. Battery last much longer than the stated 4-5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Best headphones I have ever used for audiobooks and phone conversations. I do not listen to music much but my husband likes them for music also.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Bond

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphones. They sound incredible and they are so small and very easy to carry in your purse. I tried several headphones and this were by far the best. Highly recommended, noise cancellation works incredible too.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: There not light enough to be super mobile, nor is the sound cancellation good enough to block out the street noise . Overall good purchase, but I wish I would have invested in something better.
customer_reviews.author: Alon Sharabi

customer_reviews.title: AKG Nailed It
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my traveling endeavors and all around use. Noice cancelling is enough to notice, sound quality very good. Comfy over the ears as well. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeejabis

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound and made
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine. Have been listening over an hour. Sounds amazing! The quality of both the sound and the product is very high.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the comfort on your ears. I use this with the Bluetooth for my television in my bed room. It’s really nice. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Parro

customer_reviews.title: It is a great value, absolutely better than more expensive units.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed on how well the noise cancellation works. Practically eliminates all continuous sounds, like airplane roar, but little help on people talking, etc. Muffles their sound, but does not eliminate it.great
customer_reviews.author: Tom D...

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Maybe a little too comfortable. So light sometimes I forget they on my head when no music is playing. And sound quality is great. Set up was easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping. As Good as the photos and description. The noise cancelling is prefect.
customer_reviews.author: wanleung

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I found it less comfortable than the hose. They make the ears hurt after a while
customer_reviews.author: Apurv Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Wow I love the sound of these things
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love the sound of these things! Noise canceling(?) yes some, but the music is great and phone conversations sound grewat too!
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. He loves them! Worked great on airplane and he wears them all the time, so they must be comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Herron

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Light weight,good design, easy to carry,sound quality ok,noice cancellation just passed
customer_reviews.author: LunLun

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair, love them, so I bought them for my Dad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On-ear, not over-ear
customer_reviews.text: On-ear headphones deceptively categorized as over-ear. Tight and uncomfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than others but cover and work better than slightly smaller ones for noise cancellation
customer_reviews.author: GARY CROLL

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't seem to last as long as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't seem to last as long as I thought, but the sound quality, fit, and portability make it worth everything I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smucker

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I do not need to charge it for a couple of days. The noise cancellation is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Good choice, comfortable, great sound, really good at reducing surrounding noise
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kemmerer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY AND SOUND
customer_reviews.text: Much better and more solid than my POS Beats. I've used them on flights 3 times now and now issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: AKG quality sound signature. They do get warm when worn for over 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Furey

customer_reviews.title: They are great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are worth it if you want light noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility of both wired and wireless. Will be great for travel. The sound quality is good and the controls are easy to use. The noise cancelation is good but not great. The headphones are comfortable but do not stay secure if I bend over or use them while working out. The case and accessories are fine but I wish it came with a connection to charge from an electrical outlet. I had to purchase separately from another company.
customer_reviews.author: gordyd25

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are NOT the Bluetooth version, no wirless ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are NOT the Bluetooth version, no wirless connectivity at all. Spoke with AKG they verified product I received. Process of returning .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product. Received product without the Bluetooth. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: S D

customer_reviews.title: Ears hurt after 2 hours and bad noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: My headphones have 2 major problems, first problem- ear pain from wearing for more than 2 hours, it hurts the ear structures, and even feels deep into the ear . Second problem- after 3 months, when I use noise canceling feature (wire/wireless modes) , left headphones developed weir noise , very annoying low pitch noise. Tried to return it , seller disregarded , I will go through manufactured warranty about the noise canceling problem . Sound overall is very good, music is rich and has good bass.
customer_reviews.author: Glebs

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality for music, annoying low-level buzz
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for BT connectivity and sound cancelling for air travel. Mostly happy. Very low level buzz when connected via BT; sound not present when wired and essentially inaudible when music is playing. Too late to return so I'll keep using. Microphone for phone calls works well in my office. Buttons are intuitive. Battery life acceptable for long days. Folding design and storage bag very useful and takes up minimal space in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Glacier72

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is not as good as full cup headphones
customer_reviews.text: Should have made the cups full on ear, there is no practical cost saving in manufacturing cost to making them smaller. The product works really well but would be much better and comfortable with proper cups. The sound is very good but cancellation is not quite as good (but it is impressive) as my bose 35ii. The bang for buck is better for the AKG. I bought 2x QC35ii for my family members with noise issues and 3x AKG for the rest of us.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I picked these
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones to listen to music on Pandora while I’m working. They also help cut out the background chatter of people around me. Sometimes if My Head gets too close to the computer the noise cuts out.
customer_reviews.author: GMcD

product_meta.title: AKG Noise Cancelling Headphones N60NC Wireless Bluetooth - Black - GP-N060HAHCAAA
product_meta.description: Style:N60NCCompact, wireless, and noise-canceling, the AKG N60NC headphones are ideal for traveling. Experience the detail and balance of superior studio-quality sound while streaming your favorite music or movies. Hear only what you want, even amid noisy surroundings. A long-lasting battery gives you 15 hours of playback, and the flat, foldable design lets you slip them easily into your bag, so they’re ready to entertain you on journeys long or short. Battery Type Lithium-ion Polymer (3.7V, 610mAh).
feature_bullets: Active Noise Cancellation: Whether you’re listening to a book on your commute, catching some sleep on the plane or taking a call in a noisy café, you’ll hear only what you want
AKG signature sound : AKG has devoted decades to delivering a sound experience that ignites creative expression. Balance gives you smooth, multidimensional tones rather than overpowering bass
Compact, foldable design : Flat and foldable, easily slip them into your bag. Plus, you can take them anywhere, thanks to a compact carrying case , Cable length 1.2 meter

Long-lasting battery: Get 15 hours of playback with both Bluetooth and Active Noise Cancellation turned on and up to 30 hours of playback with just ANC turned on; Bluetooth transmitter frequency range: 2402 − 2480MHz
